name: Name is a WIP
description:
Since it's in alpha the story is unfinished and the environment may change. Sorry about the name changing a lot, I'll probably give it an actual name when the story is complete and there is an actual ending.

  • Esc to close the game.
  • WASD to move.
  • Mouse to look around.
  • Q to release and capture the mouse.
  • R to restart.
